00067 sequence::sequence (database   * db,        
00068                     const char * name,      
00069                     bool         create)    
00070   : m_database(db),
00071     m_seq(NULL)
00072 {
00073     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::sequence::sequence] ENTER");
00074     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::sequence::sequence] name = " << name);
00075     LOG4CPLUS_DEBUG(logger, "[bdb::sequence::sequence] create = " << create);
00076 
00077     int res = db_sequence_create(&m_seq, m_database->m_seq, 0);
00078 
00079     if (res == 0) res = m_seq->set_flags(m_seq, DB_SEQ_INC);
00080     if (res == 0) res = m_seq->set_cachesize(m_seq, 0);
00081     if (res == 0) res = m_seq->initial_value(m_seq, 1);
00082 
00083     u_int32_t flags = DB_THREAD;
00084 
00085     if (create)
00086     {
00087         flags |= DB_CREATE | DB_EXCL;
00088     }
00089 
00090     DBT key;
00091 
00092     memset(&key, 0, sizeof(DBT));
00093     key.data = (void *) name;
00094     key.size = (u_int32_t) strlen(name);
00095 
00096     if (res == 0) res = m_seq->open(m_seq, m_database->m_txns.top(), &key, flags);
00097 
00098     if (res != 0)
00099     {
00100         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::sequence::sequence] " << db_strerror(res));
00101 
00102         if (m_seq != NULL) m_seq->close(m_seq, 0);
00103 
00104         switch (res)
00105         {
00106             case ENOENT:    throw exception(BDB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND);
00107             case EEXIST:    throw exception(BDB_ERROR_EXISTS);
00108             default:        throw exception(BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN);
00109         }
00110     }
00111 
00112     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::sequence::sequence] EXIT");
00113 }
00114 
00118 sequence::~sequence () throw ()
00119 {
00120     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::sequence::~sequence] ENTER");
00121 
00122     if (m_seq != NULL)
00123     {
00124         m_seq->close(m_seq, 0);
00125     }
00126 
00127     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::sequence::~sequence] EXIT");
00128 }

00130 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 //  Public interface.
00132 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 
00140 int64_t sequence::id ()
00141 {
00142     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::sequence::id] ENTER");
00143 
00144     db_seq_t id;
00145     int res = m_seq->get(m_seq, m_database->m_txns.top(), 1, &id, 0);
00146 
00147     if (res != 0)
00148     {
00149         LOG4CPLUS_WARN(logger, "[bdb::sequence::id] " << db_strerror(res));
00150         throw exception(BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN);
00151     }
00152 
00153     LOG4CPLUS_TRACE(logger, "[bdb::sequence::id] EXIT = " << id);
00154 
00155     return (int64_t)id;
00156 }
